name: Paintball Shoot - Knock'em All
description:
Do you think you are a paintball master? Prove your skills in the new fun first-person shooter game – Paintball Shoot 3D - Knock Them All. Grab your paintball gun and color everyone around!

Paintball Shoot 3D - Knock Them All is a fresh take on a FPS game! Smile, laugh and paint everything and everyone around you! Be careful, you won’t stop playing after trying this game once!

Beat the hordes of enemies sending chills up the hit master’s spine even. Get ready for the big bad boss fights at the end of each level. The further you go, the harder enemies you should color.

Unlock the variety of weapons: from tactical pistols to heavy machine guns full of color balls. Knock 'em all down in the most stylish way!

Why you’ll love the first-person shooter:

- Challenging levels
- Exciting gameplay
- Many paintball guns
- Cool graphics
- Easy controls

So, what are you waiting for? Forget about throwing-knife games! Refill your paintball gun tank and start the battle! Paintball Shoot 3D - Knock Them All is completely free! Download it now and play the casual shooting game right now!
